类 ShardingRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.core.rule.ShardingRule

    public class ShardingRule
extends Object
implements BaseRule
    Databases and tables sharding rule.

    zhangliang, maxiaoguang, panjuan

      • getDatabaseShardingStrategy

        public ShardingStrategy getDatabaseShardingStrategy(TableRule tableRule)
        Get database sharding strategy.

        Use default database sharding strategy if not found.

        参数:
        tableRule - table rule
        返回:
        database sharding strategy
